data.name: Crusader Kings II: Full Plate Metal
data.detailed_description:
Crusader Kings II: Full Plate Metal

Outfit your dynasty with the power to rock! Due to popular demand, a new pack of metal music is now available for Crusader Kings II. From Tobias Gustavsson,
composer of “Viking Metal” and “Guns, Drums and Steel”, five completely original compositions have been created to add intensity to your Crusader Kings experience, with inspirations drawn from Viking music, the Main Theme, Nordic culture, and – of course – heavy metal.

The following songs are included:
  • 1. Crusader Kings II - Main Theme
  • 2. A Viking Trail
  • 3. Ahurani Rain
  • 4. Passage Grave
  • 5. We're That Perfect Storm
